subject: Physical Fitness
title: The Hip: Mobility Keystone
description: A micro-lesson that makes The Hip: Mobility Keystone usable.

hook.text: Sit in a chair eight hours a day and your hips forget how to open. Modern life locks them down.

buildup.text: The hip flexors shorten from prolonged sitting. The glutes weaken from disuse. Range erodes silently.

discovery.text: Tight hips alter walking mechanics, tilt the pelvis forward, and compress the lower back.

twist.text: Hip stiffness is the number one driver of low back pain in desk workers. The pain source is above.

punchline.text: Free your hips and your back stops complaining. They're connected.

quiz.question: How do tight hips commonly manifest as pain?
options: As low back pain due to altered mechanics
